name: Together We Fall
description:
COMMAND YOUR PLATOON!

Select and mobilize your troops in the battlefield! But remember, their deaths are permanent!

SAVE THE CONTINENT FROM THE DISEASE!

Two nations in a war that extends for more than 3 years see their population dying from a dangerous disease!

BATTLE FOR IRENE'S LIFE!

Irene carries in her blood the hope of Pazzio winning the war and saving the continent from a contagious and deadly disease.

END THE WAR!

Fight your way back home strategically! You'll have your soldiers and Irene's life in your hands!

Put an end to this war with the cure!

Controls:

MOUSE 

- Mobilize your troops
- Interactions

TEAM:

SYNOPSIS:

Together We Fall is a game that is set on a continent at war, with a deadly virus that has already killed a third of the continent's population. Your country is Pazzio and you are the Sargeant of your platoon that has one mission: bring Irene, a woman that might be the cure of the virus, home from the grasp Svorov, your contry's enemy.

Are you up to the challenge? Can you deal commanding other people lives in the battlefield? Can you make the right choices? Because there's no going back and death is permanent.
